name: President Pop
description:
How to Play!

Use the Left & Right arrow keys to move! Pop balloons as they fall down by touching them. Collect the Blue, Star to earn more votes! White Balloons will give you more time! The Red Balloons minus your votes! Can you help Hillary win the election and become the first female president of the USA!

Created by AJSGameDev
